title: [Question]Vertical mobility
content:
Vertical mobility from odd to even sem is now removed.
But it is in implementation from even to odd semester.
I have failed first year i.e. 2nd semester. 
So will I be not allowed to attend 2nd year classes?

comments.body: If I remember correctly, it was always from odd to even. So if you fail even sems, idts you’ll be allowed to go to next odd sem till you clear the backlog.
depends on how many credits pending , if more than 24 , then idts they'll let ya sit for 2nd year , better talk to ur mentor
